title: asusDESIGN
content:
Does anyone know what typeface was used to make this logotype?

Much Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019064518/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_206.png) | 19.54 KB |
author: Victor Xavier

comments.content:
Hi Victor,  
‘DESIGN’ looks like a stretched [Frutiger](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019064518/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Frutiger). And the ‘a’ in ‘asus’ reminds me of [Verdana](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019064518/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Verdana).
